localizations.text: Los Antiguos de Navidad han aparecido

description.defaultText: The Halloween Ancients have vanished, but rumours tell of Christmas Ancient Ones stirring in every lake. Catch any fish to earn Fish Scales. When you've saved enough, visit Eldermistress Thalira's Cauldron to perform the ritual and summon a Christmas Ancient of your choice. Ancient Fish ignore gear statsâ€”only skill counts. This is your hardest challenge yet. Stockpile scales and begin the summons.
